Title: Blanc
Description:
Blanc Codagenic Ecommerce 3.0 theme. 

The “Blanc” white site is our pioneer theme from years of obtaining extensive ecommerce & user experience knowledge.
HomeWiki:
Blanc 1.0

Got a shop? Take it online with Blanc – Theme for Codagenic eCommerce. This elegant theme can be easily adapted for any type of product shop and its restricted only by the imagination. This theme is designed with intention to put your products in focus, while keeping an elegant look.

Please visit the documentation to learn how to configure Blanc for your needs.

WORKS WITH : Codagenic Ecommerce 3.x


Main Features

  • Fully Responsive
  • Touchscreen retina display support
  • Colour customization
  • Social Icons and sharing
  • Product image zooming
  • Product videos
  • Grid / List product view
  • Related products on product page
  • SEO optimized markup and layout
  • Cross browser compatible
